original_title: My Two Moms (A Story of Separation)
overview: Olga Merediz, a well-known New York â€“based actress decides to return to her birthplace, Guantanamo, Cuba to reunite with the nanny her family was forced to leave behind after the Cuban revolution. In the journey she not only discovers how truly connected they are but also the bond she shares with her complex biological mother.
title: My Two Moms (A Story of Separation)
